project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Implement a feature that allows users to send and receive text messages instantly.
acceptance_criteria: Messages sent by a user appear on the recipient's chat window within 1 second.
Messages are displayed in chronological order with timestamps.
Unread messages are clearly indicated until viewed.
dependencies: WebSocket or similar real-time communication protocol
non_functional: System should handle at least 10,000 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Message delivery latency must be under 1 second in 95% of cases.

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Enable one-to-one and group video calls between users in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate and receive video calls from their contact list.
Video and audio quality remain stable with less than 300ms latency under normal network conditions.
Users can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video during calls.
non_functional: Support up to 10 participants in a group call without noticeable quality loss.
End-to-end encryption for all video and audio streams.

notes: Feedback provided ('hvhjbvjh') is unclear and non-actionable, so no changes were made to the original requirements.
